name: 英文（一）
restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
Instructor: Jojo Tang              E-mail: [ptm109\_13316@ntnu.edu.tw](mailto:ptm109_13316@ntnu.edu.tw)                                    Office: 樸101

 **_English I (for Non-English Majors)_**

**What will you learn from me?**

1\. Reading Skills and Vocabulary                              2. Quality Talk (How to have a meaningful discussion)

3\. Get Ready for the Writing and Speaking Parts of TOEIC 4. Group Work (how to work in a team)

**What do you need to bring to class?**

1\. Notebook                            2. Binder (資料夾)                             3. Reading Textbook

**How many times can you be late or absent?**

1\. Your class schedule is (1020-1200) (no break time).

2\. Please be in class BEFORE (10:25). If you are not in class by that time, you will be late.

3\. If you are never late or absent to class, you will receive/get three extra points.

4\. Every time you are late, I will mark you once. (10 marks=you do not pass this course)

5\. If you are late because of another teacher, please ask the teacher to give you a note.

6\. If you are absent, don’t to use the Notification of Absence Form (學生請假系統).

7\. If you are late more than 10 times, you will fail the course and take the course again.

8\. If you are absent more than 5 times, you will fail the course and take the course again.

9\. If you forget to bring your notebook, textbook or binder, I will mark you ABSENT one time.

10\. Every time you are late (with no reasonable excuse 合理的原因), you will get -1 point.

11\. Every time you are absent (with no reasonable excuse), you will get -2 points.

**What other rules do you need to follow?**

1\. Do NOT use your electronic devices such as smart phones, laptops, iPads, or iPods in class. If you use these “electronic toys”, it will cost you 2 points each time.

2\. Always check your LINE and email. Any work that is handed in or uploaded late will cost you 10 points per day.

3\. Please follow the school rules for other things such as eating and drinking in class.

4\. Always respect your classmates, your teacher and yourself. 

5\. Be careful of the language you use in class. It’s not cool using offensive 攻擊性的language.

6\. Feel free to email me if you have any questions.

**What does the class leader have to do?**

1\. Help me take attendance.

2\. Help me with the CD, the sound system, and the projector.

3\. Help me make announcements and collect things from your classmates.

4\. Create a LINE group for our class.

\* take attendance 點名

\* projector 投影機

\* announcement 宣告

**What are the benefits of being a class leader?**

1\. You can use your smartphone anytime (except during tests).

2\. I will buy you breakfast twice a semester.

3\. You get +2 points on your final score.

4\. You get to talk to me more often.

\* If you do not do a good job, I can “fire” you anytime.

\*Benefit 利益

**Where will your score/grade come from?**

Attendance 點名 10% (-1 Late) (-2 Absent)              Classwork 25%                       Projects (作品) 20%   

\*Three Unit Tests 單元考 25%                                   TOEIC Speaking Mock Test (模擬考)          10%

\*\*Lexile Reading Pre-Test 前測 5%                         \*\*\*Scholastic Literacy Pro 線上閱讀 5%     

\* If someone is found cheating on an exam or plagiarizing a paper, he or she will fail that exam.

plagiarize 抄襲

**\*\*** 11/5 (0810-0900): You will get 5 points if you take the test. I don’t care what your score is. If you miss the test, you have to call the school to find out when you can take the test again. No test = 0 points.
